item.title: Post Malone - Circles
item.description:
Circles by Post Malone. Chords used: C, Cmaj7, F, and Fm. For educational use. Verse 2 has been removed to make it school friendly.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Julie Andrews - My Favorite Things
item.description:
For educational use. Created with chord letter names and lyrics so any non-transposing instrument can play along.
Chords used: Dm, Bbmaj7, Gm, C7, F, Bb, A7, D, G, G7, Em, Cmaj7, Am, D7, C, B7, E, A, D6
As performed by Julie Andrews in “The Sound of Music”
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/4eFEPAiSnjA
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/m/misc-movies/my-favorite-things-two/
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Billie Eilish - come out and play
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Come Out And Play - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am C Cmaj7 Dm Em F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: Single strums or D DU D DU (slow)
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems
item.description:
For educational use. Created with chord letter names and lyrics so any non-transposing instrument can play along. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdzcOAduI8E
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. item.title: Joe Brown - Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Jools Holland - 2008_UGC
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Billie Eilish - i love you
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Easy
I Love You - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am Cmaj7 Dm F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or single strums
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Chihiro Otsuka - Baby Mine
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Dm, G7, F, Cmaj7
From Dumbo (2019 Motion Picture)
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/LyqCyg853Fs
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Shawn Mendes - Señorita
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: Am, Cmaj7, F, Em, G
As performed by Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/-ADxekOsPqA
Want the intro TAB in PDF format? Visit: https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/2019/06/22/tab-for-senorita/
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from motionbolt.com. The "clean" version of the song (use in schools may still not be appropriate) is from Polar Records (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FjC5XHyK7hE)
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff

item.title: Heartstrings (ukulele play-along)
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Heartstrings on the ukulele by Kolohe Kai. The chords used are C F G Am Dm Fm E7 Cmaj7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
